chunks.zh: 老婆被仿冒 Google Chrome 网站坑了，电脑中木马
chunks.en: My wife was tricked by a fake Google Chrome website and got a trojan on her computer.

chunks.zh: 前天老婆在 Bing 搜索 Chrome 下载，排名第一的链接有一个 https://google-chrom.cn ，她觉得比较正规就在这个网站上下载安装“Chrome“浏览器（此网站不用科学上网就能打开）。
chunks.en: The day before yesterday, my wife searched for Chrome downloads on Bing. The top-ranked link was https://google-chrom.cn. She thought it looked legitimate, so she downloaded and installed the 'Chrome' browser from this website (this website can be opened without using a VPN).

chunks.zh: 安装好后，隔一段时间电脑的火绒就弹窗提示有木马，用系统还原点还原，并修改 Bitwarden 等密码，目前暂时没看到损失。
chunks.en: After installing it, Huorong (anti-virus software) on the computer popped up a warning about a trojan after a while. I used a system restore point to revert and changed passwords for Bitwarden, etc. So far, I haven't seen any losses.

chunks.zh: 截至 2025 年 2 月 21 日，目前这个网站还可以打开，而且在 Bing 国内版搜索排行第一。
chunks.en: As of February 21, 2025, this website can still be opened and is ranked first in Bing's Chinese search results.

chunks.zh: https://i.imgur.com/iNs1Ls8.png
chunks.en: https://i.imgur.com/iNs1Ls8.png

chunks.zh: 已将该网站提交至 CloudFlare 的 abuse
chunks.en: The website has been submitted to CloudFlare for abuse reporting.

chunks.zh: 已加入到 PCDN 刷下行列表
chunks.en: Added to the PCDN download list.

chunks.zh: 怎么没有人骂 bing ？
chunks.en: Why is nobody scolding Bing?

chunks.zh: @billbob #2 你是不是 chrome ？但是贴主要用其他浏览器下载 chrome 。。
chunks.en: @billbob #2 Are you Chrome? But the poster needs to download Chrome using another browser...

chunks.zh: @FabricPath #5 https://www.google-chrom.cn/help/24.html 右上角的链接 chrome.googlenav.cn 似乎没有 cdn  我在本地 hosts 里配置：42.202.173.132	www.google-chrom.cn再访问 www.google-chrom.cn 访问会有安全提示，不过还能访问图片等资源，所以我觉得 chrome.googlenav.cn 的 IP 大概率就是源站
chunks.en: @FabricPath #5 https://www.google-chrom.cn/help/24.html The link chrome.googlenav.cn in the upper right corner doesn't seem to have a CDN. I configured 42.202.173.132 www.google-chrom.cn in my local hosts file. When I visit www.google-chrom.cn again, there's a security warning, but I can still access images and other resources. So I think the IP of chrome.googlenav.cn is likely the origin server.

chunks.zh: whois google-chrom.cn    Domain Name: google-chrom.cnROID: 20240915s10001s61028514-cnDomain Status: clientTransferProhibitedRegistrant: 古开平Registrant Contact Email: [email protected]Sponsoring Registrar: Web Commerce Communications LimitedName Server: michael.ns.cloudflare.comName Server: lana.ns.cloudflare.comRegistration Time: 2024-09-15 00:27:23Expiration Time: 2025-09-15 00:27:23DNSSEC: unsigned
chunks.en: whois google-chrom.cn Domain Name: google-chrom.cnROID: 20240915s10001s61028514-cnDomain Status: clientTransferProhibitedRegistrant: 古开平Registrant Contact Email: [email protected]Sponsoring Registrar: Web Commerce Communications LimitedName Server: michael.ns.cloudflare.comName Server: lana.ns.cloudflare.comRegistration Time: 2024-09-15 00:27:23Expiration Time: 2025-09-15 00:27:23DNSSEC: unsigned

chunks.zh: @yvkino 你这图右边 Edge 显示的是 Cloudflare 的警告，因为刚才有 V 友向 CF 提交了 abuse ，说明 Edge 没有拦截
chunks.en: @yvkino The Edge browser on the right side of your picture shows a Cloudflare warning because a V2EX user submitted an abuse report to Cloudflare just now, which means Edge didn't block it.

chunks.zh: 黑猫黑产团伙，专门仿冒的，不是勒索其实还好，https://x.threatbook.com/v5/article?threatInfoID=146629
chunks.en: It's a black market group that specializes in imitation. If it's not ransomware, it's not too bad. https://x.threatbook.com/v5/article?threatInfoID=146629

chunks.zh: @yulgang 它这个源站带宽还怪高的，都打不满的
chunks.en: @yulgang Its origin server bandwidth is strangely high; it can't be fully utilized.

chunks.zh: 我出来上个 v 站小心翼翼，看别人免费🪜在 x 大放厥词，还有这种用 cn 域名搞这种事情。都不害怕的吗
chunks.en: I'm careful when I come to V2EX. I see people using free VPNs to make wild claims on X, and there are people doing things like this with .cn domains. Aren't they afraid?

chunks.zh: 巧了, 前阵子我也是同样情况, bing 搜索, 下载 chrome 中毒. 特别搞笑把我其他浏览器改名字为"已删除应用". 然后这个山寨 chrome 还卸载不掉, 360 都拿他没办法. 最后只能重装系统
chunks.en: Coincidentally, I had the same situation recently. I searched on Bing and downloaded Chrome, and it got infected. Hilariously, it renamed my other browsers to 'Deleted Application'. And this fake Chrome couldn't be uninstalled; even 360 couldn't do anything about it. I had to reinstall the system in the end.

chunks.zh: 拉到最底下：本站提供的软件仅为个人学习测试使用，请在下载后 24 小时内删除，不得用于任何商业用途，否则后果自负。（注意：本站非官方网站！）XML
chunks.en: Scroll to the bottom: The software provided on this site is for personal learning and testing purposes only. Please delete it within 24 hours after downloading; it must not be used for any commercial purposes, otherwise the consequences will be borne by yourself. (Note: This site is not an official website!) XML

chunks.zh: ?我打开就报警了,你用的什么浏览器
chunks.en: ? I get a warning when I open it. What browser are you using?

chunks.zh: https://google.cn/chrome/可以直接打开的。
chunks.en: https://google.cn/chrome/ can be opened directly.

chunks.zh: @FabricPath  cloudflare 的，不刷了🤣
chunks.en: @FabricPath It's Cloudflare, so I won't bother.

chunks.zh: @billbob 我的是 MacBookPro ，系统最新版，浏览器是 Safari 。我老婆的是 Windows 11 笔记本，最新版 Edge
chunks.en: @billbob I have a MacBook Pro, the latest version of the system, and the browser is Safari. My wife has a Windows 11 laptop, the latest version of Edge.

chunks.zh: https://google.cn/chrome/ 不翻也能打开
chunks.en: https://google.cn/chrome/ can be opened without a VPN.

chunks.zh: Chrome 打开直接页面全红了
chunks.en: When I open it in Chrome, the entire page turns red.

chunks.zh: chrom 没有 e google-chrom （ e ）.cn是真的仿冒了
chunks.en: chrom without the 'e', google-chrom(e).cn is definitely a fake.

chunks.zh: @xdeng 我这边 Safari 和 Edge 无任何警示，Chrome 提示危险网站@mizuki9 她没什么信息安全意识，太过于相信 Bing 的搜索排行。
chunks.en: @xdeng I don't get any warnings in Safari or Edge here. Chrome warns of a dangerous website. @mizuki9 She doesn't have much awareness of information security and trusts Bing's search rankings too much.
